content: **get cozy with this adorable pumpkin knitting pattern ** ready for a delightfully charming autumn knitting project this free munchkin pumpkin pattern is the perfect companion for your warm cup of cocoa and a crisp fall evening fall in love with this irresistibly cute knitted pumpkin whether you re a beginner or an experienced knitter you ll find joy in bringing these adorable pumpkins to life **customizable and beginner-friendly** feel like playing around with sizes and colors go ahead this pattern is as flexible as it is fun create a tiny pumpkin for your mantel or a jumbo one for your porch choose autumnal oranges or go rogue with unexpected hues **fast fun and oh-so simple** with no increasing or decreasing this cute little pumpkin so so simple to make you ll have your own pumpkin patch growing in no time a couple of hours some yarn scraps and voilà - your knitted pumpkin is ready to steal the show **skill level ** beginner **size ** one size **finished measurements approx ** 2 5 cm high 3 5 9 cm diameter **yarn ** worsted weight yarn 45 yds/40 m mc shown in cascade 220 worsted weight 100% wool 220 yds/200 m per 100g/3 5oz 1 ball in jack o lantern 7824 **needles ** 4 mm us 6 needles for working in the round or size needed to obtain gauge **gauge ** 5 sts x 7 rounds = 4 inches 10 cm in stockinette stitch worked in the round **notions ** stitch marker tapestry needle polyfil or toy stuffing cinnamon stick or twig tape measure scissors
